TEXT.TITLE: <RESER'S FINE FOODS INC> TO GO PRIVATE
TEXT.BODY: Reser's Fine Foods Inc said certain directors and officers, who currently represent about 85 pct of the company's stock, plan to take Reser's private through a cash buyout. The company said the group plans to offer 12.50 dlrs per share for the 15 pct of its stock currently outstanding. Reuter
